title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 482-2.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 482-2.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Subpart is to establish the annual
fee to be submitted by air contamination sources subject to the operating
permit program for emissions of regulated air contaminants. This Subpart is
adopted pursuant to the statutory authority granted to the department under
section
72-0303
of the Environmental

Conservation Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
482-2.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
